posts.post_content: Hi everyone, looking to add more Ty Cobb postcards to my collection. Preferably looking for ones I don’t have. Willing to do a cash or cash + trade deal. I know it’s a long shot but if anyone is looking to part with a Rose postcard it would be #1 on my list. Please let me know what’s available!
you need a dietsche fielding real...real bad!!!!
I agree! Do you have one you're looking to sell by chance?

Wow

Great Collection of cards. Many great cobbs and Ruth's

[quote name="Cards2121" post=2293230]I agree! Do you have one you're looking to sell by chance?[/QUOTE]

You just missed a Dietsche fielding, a Rose Postcard, and a 1909 Topping in the last REA.

I have an “extra” Dietsche fielding. PM me. Not real motivated to move it, but I could be convinced

BTW- that is an awesome pic with really amazing cards. Congrats
Great collection.  Here is my grand slam of Cobb Postcards.  Everything is available but must be motivated.

[quote name="BeanTown" post=2293469]Great collection.  Here is my grand slam of Cobb Postcards.  Everything is available but must be motivated.[/QUOTE]

Wow great collection 

You keep your collection well hidden but when you show it 
You know how to make a statement
